ygData.subject: Re: re: Trolling
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey hey! So now we ve come up with a verb based off of me? Thanks! Tch! Ok, well seriously. Like I said, I talked t othe TRUSTABLE GM and, well. I told you
ygData.messageBody:
Hey hey! So now we've come up with a verb based off of me? Thanks! Tch!

Ok, well seriously. Like I said, I talked t othe TRUSTABLE GM and, well. I
told you what he said, so it looks like until then all we can do is wait. On
a side note, according to Zamtil (probably one of the richest darn people in
the game) when I talked to him, he had gotten his tinkering skill to 107,
and it seems there is NOTHING to tinker that will currently raise it beyond
that, so thats the max skill we can get to for now. Wait, I belive that we
will in the end be rewarded with this skill....I can feel it.

>Anyone else notice that the Ocean of Tears seems to be the standard
>trolling
>location? Must be becasue its so hard to verify..
>So far, down on the ocean floor we have (gathered from many messageboards)
> - The tinkering book
> - The best shadowknight unholy sword
> - A 50ac breastplate
> - Pottery sketches required to make weapon molds..
>
>It must be getting pretty crowded down there with all these super items :).
>Seriously though, the guy that came up with the "search beneath the waves"
>tip
>has subsequently apologised and retracted, saying that he was misled.
>
><Insert silly automatic message from my mail server>
>
>
>**********************************************************************
>This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and
>intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they
>are addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify
>the system manager.
